alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McPherson, northern Harvey and southwestern Marion Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moundridge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, North Newton, Moundridge, Canton, Goessel, Walton and Newton Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 31 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
